name: Saint
description: There are more than 2.2 billion children in the world. Many are troubled by poverty and sickness. Many are abused and exploited. Problems faced by these children can be mitigated through research, product development, and volunteerism, with a number of great organizations striving to make a positive impact in these children's lives. However, a lack of funding is evident. We, Saint Token, are on a mission to change this! By simply buying the Saint Token, you will be directly contributing to our charity donation to help children! Join us!
